Aracelis Girmay (amụrụ ya na Disemba 10, 1977) bụ onye Amerika na-ede abụ. Ọ bụ onye dere nchịkọta abụ atọ, gụnyere Kingdom Animalia (2011), onye ikpeazụ maka National Book Critics Circle Award for Poetry
Ọ bụkwa osote prọfesọ nke abụ  na kọleji nke Hampshire.
Aracelis Girmay bụ onye Eritrea na Santa Ana, California. Ọ gara kọleji Connecticut ma nweta nzere Master of Fine Arts na Mahadum New York
Nchịkọta mbụ Girmay bụ Teeth (2007), nke o ritere ihe nrite nke Great Lakes Colleges Association New Writers Award.
N'afọ 2011, Girmay bipụtara Kingdom Animalia, nke a kpọrọ ya onye ikpeazụ maka National Book Critics Circle Award for Poetry. Na The Rumpus, Camille T
Dungy kwuru, "Girmay na-ede banyere ụzọ anyị nwere ike isi jikọta ọnụ, na ụzọ ụwa si kewaa anyị". Junot Diaz kwuru na uri kachasị amasị ya bụ abụ nke Kingdom Animalia, na-ede na The New York Times:
Echetara m ịgụgharị ahịrịokwu ndị a n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nwanne m nwanyị nwụsịrị:

The Black Maria (2016) bụ nchịkọta nke atọ nke Girmay. N'ịhọrọ The Black Maria dị ka "Pick of the Week" n'ọnwa Eprel 2016, Publishers Weekly kọwara ya dị ka "nchịkọta na-agagharị agagharị nke abụ abụ, nke nwere nnukwu ihe oyiyi nke na-adaba n'akụkụ mma na-ekewa adịghị ike na ike na-enweghị mgbaghara". The Boston Globe kpọrọ ya otu n'ime akwụkwọ kachasị mma nke afọ 2016.
Girmay bụ osote prọfesọ nke uri na Hampshire College.
Onye mmeri nke afọ 2009, Great Lakes Colleges Association New Writers Award
